items.question: Can I drive my own car?
items.answer: Absolutely! There is ample parking available at the venue. Please bring your driving directions or use GPS to navigate.

items.question: Will I need a visa to go to Ghana?
Can children attend?
items.answer: Children are welcome at our celebration. We will have activities and accommodations for families. Please mention their names and ages in the RSVP form.

gifts.title: Gifts
gifts.description1: Your presence is the greatest gift we can receive.
gifts.description2: Having you by our side on this special day is all we need. However, if you wish to give us a gift, any form of present will be received with much love and gratitude.
